page.title: 15Blackfield Middle school
page.content: In September 1982 several primary schools in the Waterside area became First and Middle schools. These took children from 5_8 and 8_12 years. Blackfield and Holbury were both extended to make room for Middle school provision. We visited Blackfield school to see if we could find any similarities and differences. Blackfield school is older than Holbury Middle.Blackfield school was built in 1958 and our school was built in 1968. Our school is about the same as their school. In our upper school area we have got an open area. Our open area is bigger than their's.Their classrooms are smaller and some are bigger.In our school there are 15 classrooms whereas they have 14. Blackfield have a swimming pool and a large running track.
